ftbquests.modpack.title: &6Lucky World&r &cInvasion&r &ev2.6.1&r
ftbquests.chapter.0.quest1.description1: The End, also known as the End Dimension, is a barren and empty plain. This dimension is home to numerous Endermen (which spawn more frequently than in the Overworld) and an Ender Dragon. Here, you will engage in a life-or-death battle with the Ender Dragon. Make sure you are well-prepared.
ftbquests.chapter.0.quest7.description1: Can be found in End City chests
ftbquests.chapter.0.title: The End [&aDifficulty: 20+&r]
ftbquests.chapter.053F419E3E08847C.quest: This is a forest world shrouded in eternal night. Here, you can find twisted dark mazes, monster-infested mines, bottomless chasms, towering spires, aurora-lit palaces on glaciers, massive dragon caves, and various other unique terrains and dungeons waiting to be explored.
In the &eBlood Forest&r, create a 2×2 water pool using dirt (&cNote: The bottom must also be dirt!&r), then throw in a diamond.
ftbquests.chapter.053F419E3E08847C.title: Twilight Forest [&6Difficulty: 80+&r]
ftbquests.chapter.0C80A5748A662C54.quest: The Shadowlands is a dark, shadowy dimension dominated by gray trees and blackstone dungeons. Occasionally, you may encounter Red Cactus Forests. In this realm, you can find keys to the Glowshroom Forest and Vellium dimensions.
Defeating Golden Cubes has a chance to drop Void Orbs. Activate the Eclipse Altar to summon the boss Eclipse.
Source: Mined from Shadow Steel Ore
Golden Cubes usually spawn in Void Groves.
ftbquests.chapter.0C80A5748A662C54.title: Shadowlands [&6Difficulty: 50+&r]
ftbquests.chapter.0E658DFD921E1C61.quest: There may be conflicts. It is recommended to disable shaders during invasions.
Shader Compatibility

Lucky Blocks are blocks that can yield various items or events. Different materials can be used to increase or decrease luck (also applicable to Lucky Weapons), altering the probability of good or bad outcomes.
Common gameplay modes:
1. Map Race: (Requires a pre-made map)
Multiple players compete in a Lucky Block map, followed by PvP to determine the last survivor.
2. Skyblock Survival: (Requires an infinite Lucky Block source)
Players start on a resource-scarce skyblock and use Lucky Blocks to gather resources, aiming to complete the game.
3. Normal Survival: (Lucky Blocks are obtained through quests or random generation)
Players explore to find Lucky Blocks, obtaining rare items to aid survival or increase challenges.
For more details, see the [&eLucky Block Journey&r] chapter group.
About Lucky Blocks
Invasion types:
Primary Invasion, Secondary Invasion, Super Invasion, and Nightmare Invasion

Invasions can occur during both day and night. Primary Invasions dominate initially, followed by Secondary Invasions as severity increases. Invasions may spawn monsters with red borders (&cSuper Enhanced&r) or purple borders (&5Nightmare Enhanced&r). Super Invasions typically accompany higher severity, spawning many Super Enhanced monsters. Nightmare Invasions are the hardest, with the highest severity and numerous Nightmare Enhanced monsters.
Invasion details can be viewed in the chat. As days pass, higher-level or rarer invasions may occur.

The first invasion occurs after &e21&r days (night invasion). Subsequent invasions happen at intervals (unlucky players may face invasions all day). &cSleep is impossible during invasions.&r Invasions cancel automatically after some time. Defeating &e100&r invasion-spawned monsters ends the current invasion. Different dimensions have varying invasion cycles and types.
Invasion Mechanics
· The difficulty value is displayed in the bottom-right corner by default, starting at 0.
· Ghasts fire multiple fireballs in rapid succession.
· All monsters may ride phantoms to reach high players or throw ender pearls to chase them.
And more...
How to increase difficulty:
· Difficulty increases over time, averaging 0.5 per day.
· Use [{item.kubejs.bad_apple}]
How to decrease difficulty:
· Death reduces difficulty automatically.
· Higher difficulty increases monster stats and improves their equipment.
· Difficulty is tied to dimensions. Certain dimensions cannot be entered until reaching specific difficulty levels.
AI Enhancements:
· Zombies can dig, use fishing rods to pull players, and occasionally hook items.
· Spiders shoot webs to attack players.
· Creepers explode through walls and may launch themselves at players.
· Skeletons have increased accuracy and flee when players approach.
· Blazes fire multiple fireballs in rapid succession.
Difficulty Mechanics
Players using Silk Touch (each level increases probability by &e10%&r) to mine Lucky Blocks will trigger an event.
Triggered events queue on the left side of the screen. After the countdown, a random server player is selected for the event. Only one type of Lucky Block event can queue at a time.
About Lucky Block Events
Players can commit three levels of crimes: Minor, Moderate, and Severe.
Witnesses:
Crimes are only recorded if witnessed.
Witness detection range is affected by player stealth—sneaking, low light levels, and invisibility potions help avoid detection.
Reputation (hold an emerald and right-click a villager to check):
Hated: Iron Golems protect villagers and attack the player.
Shunned: Villagers refuse to trade with the player.
Distrusted: Higher trading prices.
Neutral
Accepted: Minor crimes may be ignored.
Respected: Moderate crimes may be ignored.
Each crime lowers the player's reputation with all witnessing villagers.
Revered: Severe crimes may be ignored.

Committing crimes or attacking/killing villagers lowers reputation. Reputation can be increased by defeating raids, giving gifts, or through vanilla methods (e.g., trading or curing zombie villagers).
Gifts:
Sneak and right-click with an emerald to gift it to a villager, increasing reputation.
Severe crimes reduce reputation to the point where Iron Golems attack the player.
If Iron Golems or Guard Villagers witness Moderate or Severe crimes, they will attack the player immediately.
Only actions within "protected" structures are considered crimes. By default, "protected" structures refer to villages.
Crime List:
Minor: Trampling crops, hay bales, lanterns, campfires; kicking villagers out of beds.
Moderate: Breaking chests, barrels, villager workstations, beds; opening chests or barrels; sleeping in claimed beds.
Severe: Breaking bells.
Village Mechanics Overhaul
Circle: Normal Quest
Rounded Square: Starting Quest
Square: Exploration Quest
Pentagon: Kill Quest
Hexagon: Boss Quest
Diamond: Collection Quest
Octagon:
Heart:
Gear:
Understanding Quest Icons
Voice chat is supported in-game, but be careful not to let monsters hear you.
Gunshots also attract monsters.
About Sound
Hold C and left-click items in the inventory to lock them. Click again to unlock.
Press V to use melee attacks with firearms.
Check or modify key bindings in Controls.
Special Key Bindings
ftbquests.chapter.0E658DFD921E1C61.title: Known Issues
ftbquests.chapter.0EE09E3CE63A750E.quest: This section lists some special or rare items as late-game goals.
ftbquests.chapter.0EE09E3CE63A750E.title: Collector
ftbquests.chapter.112F5DB92B546247.quest: Ways to increase luck for general Lucky Blocks:
Lucky Blocks that can be collected with Silk Touch can increase luck. Check JEI for specific recipes.
&cBeware of the first monster that appears.&r
ftbquests.chapter.112F5DB92B546247.title: &b☆Relations and Types☆&r
ftbquests.chapter.1AC0F1AE8CC91A7A.quest: This section covers storage-related items to address the problem of too many items and no place to store them.
3. Build a tech-based storage system in a safe location
Pros: Unlimited range, centralized management, compact footprint.
Cons: Complex crafting, requires energy.
Includes personal storage, warehouse storage, and some automation (automation details are not covered here; explore on your own).
Since monsters can break blocks, you can choose one storage solution or use a combination:
1. Use backpacks for storage
Pros: Quick and easy, no need to rummage through chests.
Cons: Limited capacity, death may leave supplies out of reach, &ctoo many items may cause backpack lag.&r
2. Build chest storage in a safe location
Pros: Cheap to craft, easy to use, great for early game.
Cons: Limited access range, takes up space, requires manual management (can be managed by maids).
Description
Chest Storage
{itemGroup.sophisticatedstorage}
Upgrade a furnace to a generator using reinforcement components, then open the furnace's &bleft&r configuration page and set the facing direction to &6Output&r.
Assemble &bStorage Components&r and &bDisk Casings&r in a crafting table, then place them in a &bDisk Drive&r.
Recommended: Add a &bSmoker Upgrade&r and use baked potatoes for power.
How to Power the Controller

Only one controller is needed per network. Open the controller interface to view energy consumption. Disks must be installed in the Disk Manager to function. Disk capacity is measured in &bitem count&r. Early-game players can store low-stack, high-quantity items in the network and high-stack items in chests to save space.
Tech Storage
Only key upgrades are listed here. Check recipes for more.
Backpacks can be placed on the ground by sneaking + right-clicking to use as chests. Press B in the inventory to access them. Works when equipped in the accessory slot.
Personal Storage
Requires Disk Casings.
Requires Disk Casings.
Connect the Wireless Access Point to a terminal. Open its GUI to view range and install upgrades.
Wireless Crafting Terminals must be bound to a controller by sneaking + right-clicking.
Solution for out-of-range or cross-dimension access: Use chunk loaders.
Also has upgrades.
Each increases range by 8 blocks.
Only key upgrades are listed here. Check recipes for more.
Mainly used to load chunks for storage networks, ensuring wireless terminals function properly.
Battery Upgrades convert backpack slots into batteries. Sneak + right-click to place the backpack on the ground and charge it with a generator.
How to Power Handheld Wireless Devices
ftbquests.chapter.1AC0F1AE8CC91A7A.title: Logistics System
ftbquests.chapter.1F0309125C22C0DF.quest: The Vellium dimension appears bright and peaceful—but don’t be fooled. The strange Yellow One-eyed Beasts here are deadly to players. If you act recklessly, you’ll find yourself hopelessly lost in the endless Fields of Fluffy Cloud below.
Source: Mined from Tyrant Steel Ore
Activation: Right-click with a Sacred Orb
Find a tower structure with a light purple portal frame at the top. The portal igniter can be found in nearby chests.
ftbquests.chapter.1F0309125C22C0DF.title: Vellium [&6Difficulty: 50+&r]
ftbquests.chapter.21813E116D813E1F.title: Financial Master
ftbquests.chapter.2323EDC238E1D21A.quest: Normally, you don’t need to store XP unless you die unexpectedly.
There are two ways to store XP: Using XP Tomes (stores up to 30 levels, ideal for early game) or Backpack XP Pump Upgrades + Tank Upgrades + Stack Upgrades (stores large amounts for late game).
Alternatively, you can store XP the hardcore way: hoard bottles o’ enchanting.
ftbquests.chapter.2323EDC238E1D21A.title: XP Storage
ftbquests.chapter.233F26D92C44074A.quest: The basic trio for crafting firearms.
Below are extended firearm workbenches for crafting more powerful weapons.
To the right is the workbench for crafting CS-style weapons.
ftbquests.chapter.233F26D92C44074A.title: Firepower Suppression
ftbquests.chapter.25EFA61D7D9572C4.quest: Launches ignited TNT, which does not explode instantly.
Has a long reach distance, an early-game artifact.
Recommended to use in combination, though the harpoon can also be used alone.
Creepers will treat you as one of their own.
Extremely powerful set bonus, making it late-game god-tier armor that renders you nearly invincible against invasions.
Boots grant a one-minute flight buff upon entering water, allowing creative flight.
Boots can activate a 6x6x6 ocean domain, allowing swimming, which is akin to slow free flight.
The set comes with powerful stats, making it suitable as late-game equipment.
Right-click to launch water balloons and lightning.
Functions like an elytra without fireworks. Press Y to launch upward once, repeatable. Allows continuous flight.
Grants the ability to become wet. Press G to activate.
Deals actual damage ranging from 4.75 to 15.75.
Launches targets upward briefly and rapidly, unlike the slow ascent of levitation.
ftbquests.chapter.25EFA61D7D9572C4.title: {block.lucky.water_lucky_block}
ftbquests.chapter.2620CA9C0D7B5EA1.quest: A magical potion that grants the abilities of creatures.
Requires a glass bottle and the Ability Steal enchantment.
ftbquests.chapter.2620CA9C0D7B5EA1.title: Spinning Lucky Block
ftbquests.chapter.2680C45B135840DC.quest: Use a Challenge Badge to right-click the block and summon it.
&cServer challenges may cause crashes and are temporarily disabled!&r
ftbquests.chapter.2680C45B135840DC.title: Final Challenge
ftbquests.chapter.26CBDB80E671D500.quest: Pour milk into a cauldron to make cheese.
First, corner the rat, then throw cheese on the ground near it. After feeding it 10-20 pieces of cheese, the rat can be tamed.
Right-click the rat to open its inventory. Sneak + right-click to place the rat on your shoulder.
ftbquests.chapter.26CBDB80E671D500.title: Specialized "Rat" Pet
ftbquests.chapter.285BBB7AC0649BDF.quest: This is a bestiary for non-essential monsters, used for challenges.
Description
A giant spawned from lucky blocks, with fast movement speed.
Creepers are a headache-inducing mob. They often appear unexpectedly and blow up your hard-earned resources. Now they can even launch themselves—watch out for creeper artillery!
Creeper Faction
They usually attack with crossbows. You can dodge their shots by getting close and strafing.
They summon vexes that can fly through walls and use magical attacks, making them tough to deal with. However, they are one of the sources of Totems of Undying.
A pillager wielding an axe, fast and dangerous. Recommended to attack from range.
Pillagers usually appear in raids or pillager outposts in the Overworld. They are numerous, so avoid outposts early on without good gear.
Pillager Faction
Spiders can spit webs. Don’t assume they’ll just slowly approach and attack—they also make great mounts, often bringing allies to fight you.
Spider Faction

Guardians and their variants typically live in ocean monuments. They use lasers to lock onto players and deal damage. Players can block line of sight with blocks to avoid targeting. Different guardians have varying abilities.
Guardian Faction
They usually appear on pirate ships.
Formed when regular skeletons drown in water.
Despite sharing the same name, they are not bosses.
Witches in this world are no pushovers. They are potion masters, so avoid prolonged fights—finish them quickly with strong attacks.
Features bosses for early to late-game challenges, as well as some unique creatures.
Other Factions
Appears during invasions.
Beware of ghast bombers.
Skeletons typically use bows. With AI enhancements, they are expert marksmen. Keep your distance and avoid exposed positions.
Skeleton Faction
Zombies usually attack in melee, but now they can also use fishing rods to pull players in. Dodge carefully.
Zombie Faction
Yellow.
Appears in difficulty stage: Normal
BOSS in the Undead Legion invasion event.
Appears in difficulty stage: Normal
Appears in difficulty stage: Hard
Be cautious when opening loot chests—they might be nearby.
Appears in difficulty stage: Normal
BOSS in the Undead Legion invasion event.
Appears in difficulty stage: Hard
BOSS in the Undead Legion invasion event.
Appears in difficulty stage: Master
This is a special faction that typically unlocks as difficulty stages progress (not difficulty value) and appears in Undead Legion invasion events.
Manually triggered using Undead Banners (only in the Overworld).
&6First time entering another dimension: Enables Hard Mode&r
&cKilling the Ender Dragon: Enables Expert Difficulty&r
Undead Legion
Slimes are mobs that come in different sizes. Killing a slime larger than size 1 causes it to split into smaller ones.
Slime Faction
ftbquests.chapter.285BBB7AC0649BDF.title: Combat Expert

ftbquests.chapter.32F501713036A4F4.quest: This is a modpack centered around lucky blocks and invasions. The Ender Dragon is extremely powerful—you’ll need ample preparation before venturing into the End to defeat it. Before that, however, you may face relentless invasions.
&cSome quests are hidden and will unlock after completing prerequisites.&r
How to enable Skyblock/Race Map mode:
New World -> World -> World Type: Skyblock -> Customize -> Select a template
ftbquests.chapter.32F501713036A4F4.title: &l&cIntroduction&r&r
ftbquests.chapter.39179FC65944D8CD.quest: Beds can set respawn points. It’s recommended to make one early before finding a suitable home. Sleeping bags skip the night without setting a respawn point.
Tip: The minimap shows the time—you can sleep after 18:33.
ftbquests.chapter.39179FC65944D8CD.title: Miscellaneous

ftbquests.chapter.3CB241BA5FB30DBF.quest: Wearing this makes Heiho neutral toward you.
The Mushroom Kingdom is a world filled with Mario-themed elements, where you can find related creatures and items.
In Lucky World Invasion, this is the origin of lucky blocks, which have leaked into other worlds from here.
ftbquests.chapter.3CB241BA5FB30DBF.title: Mushroom Kingdom [&aDifficulty: 5+&r]
ftbquests.chapter.3E17CA3251E05EA9.quest: The accessories above have a chance to drop from various loot chests or be obtained by defeating Mimics. Random mobs may also carry accessories.

Left side shows growable relics. Press Shift to view conditions for gaining &bRelic EXP&r. Skills can be manually upgraded, and quality can be reset using &bPlayer EXP&r. Relics may drop from various loot chests.

Right-side accessories come with &bAccessory Upgrade Slots&r. If you obtain &bAccessory Upgrades&r in survival, you can place them in a crafting table to install into accessories with empty slots. These are typically obtained by defeating mobs.
The accessories below are crafted step-by-step from basic ones. First, craft a &bArtisan’s Workshop&r to make basic accessories. Check JEI for sources.
Can be obtained while harvesting crops.
Can be obtained when tools break.
Can be obtained while opening chests.
Can be obtained while harvesting crops.
Can be obtained while taming animals.
These accessories can be crafted directly.
Advanced accessories require this crafting process.
ftbquests.chapter.3E17CA3251E05EA9.title: Accessory Expert

ftbquests.chapter.41EAB6A8874B5DCC.quest: BloodForest is a spiky and bloody woodland. Without proper armor, the spikes alone can shred players to pieces. There are also vast lava lakes with hidden rooms, accessible only by finding portals.
Can be found in a chest atop a structure.
Distribution: Typically found between layers -16 to 128
ftbquests.chapter.41EAB6A8874B5DCC.title: BloodForest [&6Difficulty: 50+&r]
ftbquests.chapter.440598218D3432C3.quest: Use an anvil to crush gems into gem dust.
The Smithing Table is used for socketing gems.
Can recycle many items and break gems into gem dust.
ftbquests.chapter.440598218D3432C3.title: Enhancement Master
ftbquests.chapter.4428548C42F3D842.quest: The Glowshroom Forest is filled with glowing mushrooms, but beware—not all of them stay put or welcome visitors. This dimension is also home to stinging jellyfish and spore mines, which may seem harmless but explode without warning if approached. Countless towers and dungeons await exploration.
Equip a full set of Voidwalker armor and right-click the Eclipse Altar to obtain the Glowshroom Forest Portal Igniter.
Killing Acidic Snails generates snail acid, which can be collected by right-clicking with a containment box.
Distribution: Typically found between layers -24 to 45
Source: Mined from Blue Gemstone Ore
Distribution: Typically found between layers 1 to 64
Distribution: Typically found between layers -60 to -16
Source: Mined from Ghost Alloy Ore
Distribution: Typically found between layers -16 to 64
Toxic Spores can be obtained from underwater dungeon loot blocks.
ftbquests.chapter.4428548C42F3D842.title: Glowshroom Forest [&6Difficulty: 50+&r]
ftbquests.chapter.455423C6CFEB7C54.quest: In Lucky World Invasion, players typically search for lucky blocks, but for adventures, having fixed habitats to counter invasions or transport villagers from lucky blocks (who are vulnerable to mob attacks) requires transportation systems.

Waystones are convenient tools for long-distance travel, often found in the wild or villages. There are two types: regular waystones (activated and visible only to the player) and shared waystones (allowing path sharing with others).
Sneak + right-click with an empty hand to rename waypoints.
Besides sailing, boats can trap certain mobs.
Players can right-click waystones to open the GUI. To transport other entities, use this.
Requires at least two to function. Place them down and exchange Resonance Shards to link them.
ftbquests.chapter.455423C6CFEB7C54.title: Transportation System
ftbquests.chapter.4986922C36E26385.quest: Right-click {entity.voidscape.null_servant} to transform into a BOSS.
Right-click {entity.voidscape.null_servant} to transform into a BOSS.
Right-click {entity.voidscape.null_servant} to transform into a BOSS.
ftbquests.chapter.4986922C36E26385.title: Void World [&cDifficulty: 120+&r]
ftbquests.chapter.4B0D73789A6AE9BF.title: {block.lucky.elefire_lucky_block}
ftbquests.chapter.4B7B453A2454DCF8.quest: The dimension consists of jungles, beaches, and oceans, with islands shaped like cheese holes.
Ruins of marble cheese structures hint at the former glory of Ratlantis, with wild Ratlanteans, Pirate Rats, and Ratlantean Spirits spawning here.
Return via the Ratlantis portal in the sky or reuse the Big Cheese Token.
The new Ratlanteans have extremely high health, fast movement speed, and small hitboxes. They will attack players and also wander around attacking all vanilla creatures.
Use cages to trap wild Ratlanteans, and newly summoned Ratlanteans won't be able to break free from the cages.
Roams in the air, classified as a 'neutral mob.' Will actively attack players (it's the plane attacking, not me).
Hostile to all non-Ratlantean creatures, will immediately attack players and Overworld mobs, and can destroy blocks weaker than obsidian (occasionally can break obsidian).

Its inspiration comes from the legend of The Flying Dutchman. Parts of the Pirates of the Caribbean series are also based on this. The Flying Dutchman is a ghost ship in legend that can never return to port. In this mod, 'Duchman' (Dutchman) is changed to 'Duchrat' (Dutch Rat). Additionally, in some versions of the legend, The Flying Dutchman was banned from all ports due to a severe rat plague onboard, making it impossible to dock.
Reverse reverse evolution—prepare to ascend to godhood.
Refer to the construction method of iron golems.
ftbquests.chapter.4B7B453A2454DCF8.title: Ratlantis [&cDifficulty: 100+&r]
ftbquests.chapter.530029FE1468C705.title: {block.lucky.eleice_lucky_block}

ftbquests.chapter.5A52676034569580.title: {block.lucky.elemental_lucky_block}
ftbquests.chapter.5BB152DB79EC9A2B.quest: The Nether is a closed, dangerous dimension filled with fire, lava, fungal vegetation, and many hostile mobs. It exists in a different dimension from the Overworld and is also a cave dimension.
&cQuests marked with red arrows unlock the Shadowlands.&r
Complete the Glowing Crystal quest to obtain the summoning item.
Used to summon the Wither Skeleton Commander.
ftbquests.chapter.5BB152DB79EC9A2B.title: The Nether [&aDifficulty: 10+&r]
ftbquests.chapter.5F803EBD5F698F2B.title: {block.lucky.summer_lucky_block}
ftbquests.chapter.5FDBC52B8B92FA6A.quest: Used to locate nearby villager trades.
Through villager trades, you can easily obtain materials, weapons, enchantments, etc.
Pay attention to wandering traders—they sell rare items.
Special Merchant 1: Use &bgold coins&r to sneak + right-click on a &bcat&r to turn it into a Lucky Cat, used for currency exchange and selling items for money.
Special Merchant 2: Use &bsilver coins&r to sneak + right-click on a &brat&r (wild is fine) to turn it into Jerry, who sells {item.kubejs.bad_apple}.

Special Merchant 3: Use &bcopper coins&r to sneak + right-click on a &btoolsmith villager&r (workstation: smithing table) to turn it into a CS villager, who sells CS loot boxes for survival assistance.
ftbquests.chapter.5FDBC52B8B92FA6A.title: Trading System
ftbquests.chapter.6219C60DCF76D0C0.quest: Maids can not only help you fight but also perform many tasks. This guide explains how to obtain a capable maid.
&cNote the difference between maids and fairy maids—only regular maids can be tamed with cake; fairy maids are hostile mobs.&r
Press X to initiate AI dialogue with nearby maids (requires AI dialogue configuration).
Hold a saddle to pick up a maid.
Navigation Mode Explanation:

Maids will use held items (compasses, treasure maps, maps, or eyes of ender) to locate structures or spawn points. If the maid and player share a vehicle (currently only &bbrooms&r), press the designated key (default: V) to let the maid control or partially control the vehicle.
Touhou Little Maid
Infrastructure
Various accessories to enhance maids. Essential for raising a powerful maid.
Maid Accessories
Used to unlock maid inventory slots.
Maid Backpack
Tools to locate lost maids.
Where's the Maid?
Items to increase maid affection.
Entertainment Facilities
The Kappa Compass sets maid work and rest locations.
Practical Gadgets
Follow the guidebook to build the altar. Ensure you have enough P Points for synthesis.
Guidebook location: Handbook -> Overview -> Multiblock Altar. Click the eye icon at the bottom left of the structure diagram to toggle the projection.
Build the Altar
Holding this shows your P Points (top-left) and is essential for altar construction.
{item.touhou_little_maid.entity_id_copy}:

Right-click a mob to copy its ID. If you don't understand IDs, think of them as tags. In attack mode, the second tab in the maid's GUI lets you configure mob behavior. Paste the copied ID into the input field and click 'Add' to set behavior (default: attack all hostile mobs). To stop attacking a mob, set it to neutral or friendly.
{item.touhou_little_maid.chair_show}:
Cushions let maids fish. Customize their appearance. Use the cushion display tool to check hitboxes for large models.
Right-click to gain P Points for altar synthesis. Players can store up to 5 P Points; excess must be stored in &b{block.touhou_little_maid.maid_beacon}&r.
If your maid dies, revive it using {block.touhou_little_maid.altar} or {block.touhou_little_maid.shrine} (consumes player health, reducing it to 1—avoid doing this in dangerous areas).
Without spirit charms, this can return maids to photo form.
Combine with photos to craft maid statues.
To obtain figurines, light a fire near statues using flint and steel. Wait briefly to receive the corresponding figurine.
Observe Maid Statue
ftbquests.chapter.6219C60DCF76D0C0.title: Maid Trainer
ftbquests.chapter.62F087BC1FD6A1E1.title: {block.lucky.lucky_world_invasion_lucky_block}
ftbquests.chapter.6944C626EC53F52F.title: Gradient Lucky Block
ftbquests.chapter.694F71CAEC24AB8E.quest: The Overworld is the default starting dimension, resembling Earth with dense forests, vast plains, endless oceans, and towering mountains.
In Lucky World Invasion, players can randomly encounter various lucky blocks worldwide, adding challenge and fun.
&cQuests marked on the left unlock the Mushroom Kingdom dimension.&r
Can absorb large areas of water blocks.
Arrows used by the Aquatic Bow, Water Bow, and Water Tri-Bow.
You might spot ships on the ocean—beware of pirates, but they carry key materials for crafting Water Lucky Blocks.
Don’t forget to check the barrels under the captain’s seat.
Home to Wardens, with danger and treasure chests aplenty.
Use [{block.super_block_world.power_star}] to right-click paintings on walls, activating portals to the Mushroom Kingdom.
You might see altar-like structures on land or sea—avoid them early on. Drowneds spawn nearby, inflicting drowning effects that prevent breathing on land.
A small underwater structure usually guarded by Tritons.
The Black Reaper maintains distance, attacking indirectly by summoning minions to surround targets.
Shields are essential armor, helping resist damage, especially explosions.
Right-click soul jars, then craft with shields or equip in the off-hand.
Full set bonus: +20 max health—god-tier early-game gear.
Set bonus: None. Any piece grants freeze immunity.
ftbquests.chapter.694F71CAEC24AB8E.title: Overworld

Eating &e5&r new foods increases max health by &e2&r. Check the food guide for details.
Magical flower pots accelerate crop growth. Try planting beet seeds, carrots, or potatoes for unique results.

Kill All Entities: Eliminates all non-player entities (&cUse with caution!&r).
